tweets.text: There are currently flood warnings at Swanage Bay and Preston Beach due to high waves and risk of overtopping. Stay #FloodAware. See https://t.co/QdPKdEYx15 https://t.co/O2OjjkYps5

As a little contrast everyday water companies leak 2,954,000,000 litres of water from their underinvested, under repaired, faulty, leaky pipes.

Yep that's 1,078,210,000,000 litres of water per year stolen from our rivers.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/RkJP0KAsoX

We're expecting some severe weather from tonight into the weekend - please keep a close eye on our @metoffice warnings and those from our colleagues like @EnvAgency and @ScottishEPA #StormAlex https://t.co/9leIkqFIB2

tweets.text: One of the local river fly monitors has recorded a score of zero at #DenhamCountryPark. This is alarming because the site has never previously been below 9 since recording started in February 2017. @ColneCAN has asked the @EnvAgency to investigate as a matter of urgency.

Solution to climate crisis
 @BillGates @Martin_Lukacs @TREEAID @BarackObama @GlblCtzn @AmericanForests @YoungGreenParty @LeoDiCaprio @JustinTrudeau @EcoWatch @JackHarries @NatureNews @dpcarrington @StandForTrees @ClimateReality @EUEnvironment @FriendsofTrees @EnvAgency @YaleE360 https://t.co/Q7ltZgwGKW

tweets.text: #Fish of the Severn Estuary are under threat. Thousands of fish will die in the double-decker sized cooling tunnels at Hinkley Point C. @EnvAgency @CefasGovUK @The_MMO please make the right decision and make sure an AFD is installed, as the DCO states. #SaveSevernsFish

@live2max2 @AnimeNera Afternoon, I have found out that this is a private waste company who will have waste permits registered with either @hantsconnect or @EnvAgency  the permits are likely to have restrictions in regards to how much waste is there and the height it allowed to be. Thanks LT~

tweets.text:
#Dartmoor Headwaters Natural Flood Management Project has been piloting ways to work with natural processes to reduce flood risk #SlowTheFlow @EnvAgency

Watch how a Willow Faggot Dam slows down peak flow during a storm ‚õàÔ∏è 

About the project üëâ https://t.co/8nMu4r8WoM https://t.co/Isi8vwfK6j

We are working with @LivUni, @merseyforest and @EnvAgency  at our #SmithillsEstate to trail how natural dams will slow the flow of water upstream and reduce flooding downstream. 

@WTTracey shows us where we are trialling our natural flood management at the estate. https://t.co/qDs8wIlFFO

The affects of #StormAlex look like bringing a wet weekend with some enhanced #flood risk. Substantial space in #Cumbria lakes helps. Tomorrow will be key for firming up #forecast. Prep underway by @EnvAgencyNW #BePrepared #floodaware #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/4dffg01gFj

The Wildlife Crime Unit has received a report re reels of thread with food found in a horse field near Southmere lake in Thamesmead.
